name: Pair of Corner Cupboards
description: Pair of Corner Cupboards; Pierre Garnier (French, about 1720 - 1800, master 1742); Paris, France; about 1765; Fir and oak veneered with ebony, tulipwood, amaranth and willow; gilt bronze mounts; marble tops; 81.DA.82; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California

medium: Fir and oak veneered with ebony, tulipwood, amaranth and willow; gilt bronze mounts; marble tops
